content:
Action:4

I'm moving upward from (2,6) to (1,6) so I can later maneuver around the board toward (3,3) and eventually push box2 downward into its hole, keeping box1 undisturbed for now.

Action:1

I'm moving left from (1,6) to (1,5) to begin my path toward reaching the cell above Box2 so I can eventually push it downward into the hole at (6,3).

Action:1

I'm moving the avatar left from (1,5) to (1,4) to gradually approach a path (via (3,3)) that will let me push the box at (4,3) downward into the hole at (6,3), aligning with our puzzle strategy.

Action:3

I'm moving down from (1,4) to eventually approach the box at (4,3) from above so that I can push it downward toward the hole at (6,3), aligning with our strategy.

Action:1
I'm moving left to head towards the position behind the lower box so I can later push it downward into the hole, expecting the avatar to advance from (2,4) to (2,3).

Action:3

I'm moving the knight down from (2,3) to (3,3) so that I'm in position above the box at (4,3) and can push it downward into the hole at (6,3) in subsequent moves.

Action:3

I'm moving down from (3,3) so that the avatar pushes the box at (4,3) into (5,3), setting it up to be pushed into the hole at (6,3) on the next move.

Action:3

I'm moving the knight down from (4,3) so that it pushes the box at (5,3) into the hole at (6,3), which should remove that box and earn a point.

Action:2

I'm moving the knight to the right from (5,3) to (5,4), beginning the planned route to reach position (2,6) so I can later push the box left toward the hole at (1,3).

Action:1

I'm moving left from (5,4) to (5,3) so I can begin navigating a route around the walls toward (2,6) to eventually push the box left into position for it to be directed into a hole.

Action:2

I'm moving right to begin navigating from the avatar's current position (5,3) toward a strategic position (2,6) that will allow me to push the box left toward the hole.

Action:2

I'm moving right from (5,4) to (5,5) to begin the path toward positioning behind the box at (2,5) for a proper push, with the goal of guiding it step-by-step into the hole at (1,3).

Action:4

I'm moving UP from (5,5) to (4,5) to start navigating toward the box's right side, which will allow me to push the box left on its path toward the hole at (1,3).

Action: 2

I'm moving right from (4,5) to begin a path toward (2,6) so that I can later push the box left toward the top hole, aligning with our strategy.

Action:4

I’m moving UP from (4,6) to (3,6) so that I can later position on (2,6) to push the box left toward the hole.

Action:4

I'm moving the avatar up from (3,6) to (2,6) to get directly to the right of the box at (2,5) so that I can push it left toward the hole at (1,3).

```Action:1```

I'm choosing to move left so that my avatar, now facing left, pushes the box from (2,5) to (2,4) – a key first move in aligning the box with one of the holes.

Action:1

I'm pushing left to move the box from (2,4) to (2,3) while the knight occupies (2,4), setting up an opportunity to later push the box upward into the hole at (1,3).

Action:3

I'm moving down from (2,4) to (3,4) to position myself to ultimately push the box upward from (3,3) into the hole at (1,3), aligning with the planned strategy.

```Action:1```
I'm moving left from (3,4) to (3,3) so I can position myself directly below the box at (2,3) to push it upward into the hole at (1,3), aligning with the strategy to clear boxes.

Action:4

I'm moving up to push the box from (2,3) into the hole at (1,3) and expect this will clear the box as planned.
